segments.text: Brian and Christina were mentioning that maybe it would be fun to go on vacation together this year , John .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought that I already told you that I am going with Mark to Alaska .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know what ? You and I had no plans , so I made plans with Mark . What's the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have been together for a year and usually , people who've been together a year , take their vacation together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think that I ever heard of that rule before . Any more rules that you would like to tell me about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go on your vacation with Mark and when you come back , why don't you just move in with him as well !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am really looking forward to getting away from you . Far away from you !
segments.speaker: S2
